text:
@realDonaldTrump Now what cadet chicken shit?
I heard from a friend that  all we have to do is  show mr. covid19 your pic and the virus dies in a nanosecond! LOL LOL 
You certainly made a fool out of yourself yesterday!
Then you ran away today like an angry toddler
EmbarrASSED yourself AGAIN!
